Measure the length of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse prepares the necessary tools for measuring the gastric tube length.
Measure the length of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Measure the length of the gastric tube.object: the necessary tools for measuring the gastric tube length
Measure the length of the gastric tube.tools: measuring tape, gastric tube calibration chart

Measure the length of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse positions the patient comfortably to ensure accurate measurement.
Measure the length of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse

Measure the length of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse identifies the insertion point of the gastric tube in the patient's nostril.
Measure the length of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Measure the length of the gastric tube.object: the insertion point of the gastric tube

Measure the length of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse measures the distance from the insertion point to the patient's stomach using the measuring tape.
Measure the length of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Measure the length of the gastric tube.object: the distance from the insertion point to the patient's stomach

Measure the length of the gastric tube.sentence: The nurse records the measured length for future reference and documentation.
Measure the length of the gastric tube.subject: The nurse
